name: Lohikeitto
effect:
Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: Classic soup from the frigid regions. Succulent salmon is cut into chunks and cooked with fresh vegetables. Cream is added just before serving, along with other special seasonings, to create a bowl of warm, hearty chowder with a silky-smooth texture.

suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: A classic soup from the frigid regions. At first glance, it looks appetizing enough. However, a single sip reveals a burnt flavor that overwhelms your taste buds. You quickly inspect the pot and sure enough, the bottom is a charred, black mess... For the sake of your health, it's probably best to skip this one.

normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: Classic soup from the frigid regions. Succulent salmon is cut into chunks and cooked with fresh vegetables. Cream is added just before serving, along with other special seasonings, to create a bowl of warm, hearty chowder with a silky-smooth texture.

delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: A classic soup from the frigid regions. The creamy chowder, smooth as flowing silk, envelops each ingredient in its smooth embrace. As you take your first sip, you feel a gentle, cozy warmth spread throughout you, as if a vivid, golden sunrise is taking place inside your stomach.
